product_name: Blackburn Outpost Fat Bike Rear Rack
long_description: Taking the trail less traveled? Take your gear with you on your off-road adventures with this customizable rack. Its adjustable width and height allows for easy installation on any fat bike.
short_description: Taking the trail less traveled? Take your gear with you on your off-road adventures with this customizable rack. Its adjustable width and height allows for easy installation on any fat bike.
